select1.label: What type of signal are you reporting?
select1.hint: (Please note you can only report one signal at a time)

item.label: 1. Two or more people sick with similar signs and symptoms in a community within a week
2. Any death in the community due to unknown causes
3. Any child less than 15 years with a sudden onset of weakness of the limb/s not due to injury
4. Any person 5 years of age or more with lots of watery diarrhea and dehydration in the same day
5. Increased sickness including abortions and/or deaths of animals (wild or domestic and poultry/birds or fish)
6. Any person who has been bitten by a sick looking animals including dogs
7. Any event that causes public health anxiety/concern

8. Any person with a history of travel or contact (visited, lived with, attended a function with, travelled with or provided care for) with a person who has travelled from any country with a widespread transmission of COVID-19 AND Any person who reports/presenting with a severe cough, breathing problem, burning throat or hotness of the body which has not responded to therapy.
